Community Support Worker Salary. (Australia). The average wage for a Community Support Worker is AU$21.72 per hour. A skill in Case Management is associated with high pay for this job. Experience does not have a big impact on this job’s wage. People in this job generally don't have more than 20 years' experience.
The average pay for a Disability Care Worker is AU$22.24 per hour. People in this job generally don't have more than 20 years' experience.
